item.title: Bava Batra 17a - Miriam also died from a Divine kiss
item.description: Bava Batra 17a - Miriam also died from a Divine kiss — בבא בתרא יז. - מרים נמי בנשיקה מתה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tIJZi2aaIX55rVMbafiYJmwGhqDc74lShuYeLVNvRvM/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Batra 16b - Avraham had a daughter and her name was Bakol
item.description: Bava Batra 16b - Avraham had a daughter and her name was Bakol — בבא בתרא טז: - בת היתה לו לאברהם ובכל שמה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xo8Wtq34ocNHJxIKdOIgbgMvo1b-Z_rqbS7TEPyUYXs/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Batra 16b - Either friendship like the friends of Iyov or death
item.description: Bava Batra 16b - Either friendship like the friends of Iyov or death — בבא בתרא טז: - או חברותא כחברי דאיוב או מיתותא — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gBdMfVXfO6iQYeEA00AAS4bctMtPhwrx9AjKLdW6njo/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Batra 16a - You created the ox with splot hooves, You created the donkey with smooth hooves
item.description: Bava Batra 16a - You created the ox with splot hooves, You created the donkey with smooth hooves — בבא בתרא טז. - בראת שור פרסותיו סדוקות בראת חמור פרסותיו קלוטות — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14f67y1dqKqw5Htc6ZFgz8dxW-90nP4vUPtg3Jui3g5E/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Batra 15b - What was said regarding Iyov is greater than what was said regarding Avraham — בבא בתרא טו: - גדול הנאמר באיוב יותר ממה שנאמר באברהם — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t2pDe97u_Me6CULQi9wcVzvmdbXXeJIIUt5yL2pEGFE/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Batra 15a - There was a righteous amongst the gentiles and his name was Iyov — בבא בתרא טו. - חסיד היה באומות העולם ואיוב שמו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rM58EpTvFdwhpME-aFewrVbJxlU84DGWqjCU5vlp1aY/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Batra 15a - From that point on HaKadosh Baruch Hu would say and Moshe would write bedema — בבא בתרא טו. - מכאן ואילך הקב״ה אומר ומשה כותב בדמע — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1My4fwihgluYImWIKk6PHG_gJscb1v5NJUQlGEDU8OAE/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 14a - The whole luhot and the broken luhot were placed in the Aron
item.description: Bava Batra 14a - The whole luhot and the broken luhot were placed in the Aron — בבא בתרא יד. - שהלוחות ושברי לוחות מונחין בארון — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/100mmTiSqtvFod_uGcAudWgBDkPfK7lPpCCDkY7yiiOI/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 10b - I saw an upside down world, the upper were down and the lower were up
item.description: Bava Batra 10b - I saw an upside down world, the upper were down and the lower were up — בבא בתרא י: - עולם הפוך ראיתי עליונים למטה ותחתונים למעלה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1v4Kwlpn6zm3YEz1cvqHezD2whONk8elyNfbpcy8TYNY/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 10a - As Rav Pappa was ascending a ladder, a rung broke and he almost fell
item.description: Bava Batra 10a - As Rav Pappa was ascending a ladder, a rung broke and he almost fell — בבא בתרא י. - הוה סליק בדרגא אישתמיט כרעיה בעי למיפל — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cmI9DW8u3Grqas37U3xsvECNxRXYt_Mrb5zVIfYskZ4/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 10a - Rabbi Yohanan Ben Zakkai saw in a dream that they would lose 700 dinars
item.description: Bava Batra 10a - Rabbi Yohanan Ben Zakkai saw in a dream that they would lose 700 dinars — בבא בתרא י. - חזא להו בחילמא דבעו למיחסר שבע מאה דינרי — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1goEMhL87hcOP1mHwpOpZu9W65Iqg99Nbq_3ii52olEU/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Batra 9b - One who gives tzedakah secretly is greater than Moshe Rabbeinu — בבא בתרא ט: - גדול העושה צדקה בסתר יותר ממשה רבינו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1b7tdh1OLqUIWNKSwpkXMjYcZMQU17nRnzW7dvcz-Iq8/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 9a - Each and every perutah of tzedakah combines to a great sum
item.description: Bava Batra 9a - Each and every perutah of tzedakah combines to a great sum — בבא בתרא ט. - אף צדקה כל פרוטה ופרוטה מצטרפת לחשבון גדול — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dVfX_7z36iAM3v98eYQbeYrzsdRZ0Ig0ptYRpZt3BpE/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Batra 9a - The one who causes to acts is greater than the one who acts
item.description: Bava Batra 9a - The one who causes to acts is greater than the one who acts — בבא בתרא ט. - גדול המעשה יותר מן העושה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BDlqRkv9JN6GaO3gZ3h3pspIeeBxapW07GrfBVrm9yE/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Batra 8a - Calamity doesn’t come into the world except because of ignoramuses
item.description: Bava Batra 8a - Calamity doesn’t come into the world except because of ignoramuses — בבא בתרא ח. - אין פורענות באה לעולם אלא בשביל עמי הארץ — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BDlqRkv9JN6GaO3gZ3h3pspIeeBxapW07GrfBVrm9yE/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Metzia 114b - Is the master not a Kohen? Why is the master in a graveyard
item.description: Bava Metzia 114b - Is the master not a Kohen? Why is the master in a graveyard — בבא מציעא קיד: - לאו כהן הוא מר מאי טעמא קאי מר בבית הקברות — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ylkTFtp3dRJzqoLqFJNmBIe01Kjtm2NKU4SigKlST7Y/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Metzia 107a - You should not find your wife a possible niddah when you return from a journey
item.description: Bava Metzia 107a - You should not find your wife a possible niddah when you return from a journey — בבא מציעא קז. - שלא תמצא אשתך ספק נדה בשעת ביאתך מן הדרך — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PT7lnNPALmG9rsRbDOY3BZ6EbNx6aMtzpAC1rBjlyAw/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Metzia 87a - Until Avraham there was no aging in the world
item.description: Bava Metzia 87a - Until Avraham there was no aging in the world — בבא מציעא פז. - עד אברהם לא היתה זקנה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sNtu6dAanvt0fv94hhCog3RkFnBycTXsKSm1AMJYoz8/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 87a - Why are there dots over the letters ayo in the word eilav
item.description: Bava Metzia 87a - Why are there dots over the letters ayo in the word eilav — בבא מציעא פז. - למה נקוד על איו שבאליו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Qdb3_Y5J0oV6p6ml7YimAVSuOHTk4IG5Nve03uP7PB8/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.description: Bava Metzia 86b - Gavriel went in order to destroy Sodom — בבא מציעא פו: - גבריאל אזל למהפכיה לסדום — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zF4pojB2gHBngzeSyVCZLFHLoVWp8vO6HDcTrZJffIw/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.description: Bava Metzia 86b - The Heavenly angels descended to earth and ate bread — בבא מציעא פו: - מלאכי השרת ירדו למטה ואכלו לחם — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yv1eHGgiVU6TESnBBXyhjTE1k3FTYBW3w2HzdX1NxGI/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 86a - Blessed are you, Rabbah Bar Nahmani, that your body is pure and your soul left with the word 'pure'
item.description: Bava Metzia 86a - Blessed are you, Rabbah Bar Nahmani, that your body is pure and your soul left with the word 'pure' — בבא מציעא פו. - אשריך רבה בר נחמני שגופך טהור ויצאתה נשמתך בטהור — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1blxL8CouCwuMjq9Jv4DlzHkRSVd9hz3cGu1yCe4WOJ8/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Metzia 85b - Rabbi decreed a fast, and brought forward Rabbi Hiyya and his sons — בבא מציעא פה: - גזר רבי תעניתא אחתינהו לרבי חייא ובניו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N34Z-kVyXJpJiNgDp5pNmrTVCD9vttYuR3osLu3vlwI/edit?usp=drive_link. item.description: Bava Metzia 85a - From then on Torah will always return to her lodgings — בבא מציעא פה. - מכאן ואילך תורה מחזרת על אכסניא שלה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1evAx3d_OzDwErF22aWLfQQCBMR_zY83N8sMqCNlshiw/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.description: Bava Metzia 84b - Rabbi Yehuda HaNasi said to the calf, go, this is why you were created — בבא מציעא פד: - אמר ליה זיל לכך נוצרת — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1R3lUvKBe85S2tZbkDEEQ4f02AJciU_6UsSclifMwXMc/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Metzia 84b - His wife saw that a worm was emerging from his ear
item.description: Bava Metzia 84b - His wife saw that a worm was emerging from his ear — בבא מציעא פד: - חזאי ריחשא דקא נפיק מאודניה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZZmuN051AI24K39JGyNa75eBKoi-rod56Zx9QdDAuWo/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 83b - It refers to this world which is compared to night
item.description: Bava Metzia 83b - It refers to this world which is compared to night — בבא מציעא פג: - זה העולם הזה שדומה ללילה — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EQUGxHj3uzPLHxJ9MyVnzJBYnFMBUyQ4ieMGZblDlLo/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 71a - If a person calls his fellow wicked, the fellow can harass him in all aspects of his life
item.description: Bava Metzia 71a - If a person calls his fellow wicked, the fellow can harass him in all aspects of his life — בבא מציעא עא. - אדם קורא לחבירו רשע יורד עמו לחייו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_dlAqImrBa4UZBmUdxjtavrJfV2A2jaPf6r9S4Qh9kQ/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 59b - We do not pay attention to a Bat Kol
item.description: Bava Metzia 59b - We do not pay attention to a Bat Kol — בבא מציעא נט: - אין אנו משגיחין בבת קול — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1GjgeaGfcZiiiCr1f35YBgBuglsjb-ZeZ3mS9q0r3gQ0/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 58b - It is better for a man to throw himself into a fiery furnace
item.description: Bava Metzia 58b - It is better for a man to throw himself into a fiery furnace — בבא מציעא נח: - נוח לו לאדם שיפיל עצמו לכבשן האש — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gTLy7P_D7IY-GvBt0wTeG2otPeNVIvL2i5Bwog48evA/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 42a - Blessing is not bestowed except on that which is hidden from the eye
item.description: Bava Metzia 42a - Blessing is not bestowed except on that which is hidden from the eye — בבא מציעא מב. - אין הברכה מצויה אלא בדבר הסמוי מן העין — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/19cDF0ZynWimgGrN2oTtJFvjWLnjLi_4SqEszKXkaBi0/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Metzia 39b - This teaches that Yosef left without a beard and reappeared with a beard
item.description: Bava Metzia 39b - This teaches that Yosef left without a beard and reappeared with a beard — בבא מציעא לט: - מלמד שיצא בלא חתימת זקן ובא בחתימת זקן — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/17BqHaCi5LFHDTODwVATQy-PQ4RkfXriSDtmwi7FVOMs/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 33a - Hisda Hisda, I don't need you, you need me
item.description: Bava Metzia 33a - Hisda Hisda, I don't need you, you need me — בבא מציעא לג. - חסדא חסדא לא צריכנא לך את צריכת לי — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dBM99GSQDCYpX0MlelMks2QvUgb9Ntc8X1AHKdj--rg/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 29b - Someone whose father left him a lot of money and he wants to get rid of it
item.description: Bava Metzia 29b - Someone whose father left him a lot of money and he wants to get rid of it — בבא מציעא כט: - מי שהניח לו אביו מעות הרבה ורוצה לאבדן — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Z3o6X6rEBvZWA3qFmyOKMeB6_K_js7SkUjvdW71RMdI/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Metzia 23b - Regarding these three things the Rabbis alter their words
item.description: Bava Metzia 23b - Regarding these three things the Rabbis alter their words — בבא מציעא כג: - בהני תלת מילי עבידי רבנן דמשנו במלייהו — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/16GjLzVvJoInp8SV-BW723xV9bnyPYQo-xlKLh5xRlnE/edit?usp=drive_link. item.title: Bava Kamma 119a - In a place where the people are particular it is considered stealing
item.description: Bava Kamma 119a - In a place where the people are particular it is considered stealing — בבא קמא קיט. - באתרא דקפדי יש בהן משום גזל — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CSKVjdgcIqz1nAWwJBP9BGV3Msbi66LzRS1XTotzncw/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Kamma 117a - Until now the Persians were not strict about murder
item.description: Bava Kamma 117a - Until now the Persians were not strict about murder — בבא קמא קיז. - עד העידנא הוו פרסאי דלא קפדי אשפיכות דמים — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1L6UpNq0-TJJ2ulKE5RDvRtRP_x325irY_OV1WVyN-0E/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Kamma 93a - May it be His will that you will have children with covered eyes
item.description: Bava Kamma 93a - May it be His will that you will have children with covered eyes — בבא קמא צג. - יהי רצון שיהיו לך בנים כיסויי עיניים — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KBesZgLW5P42SCX6EZk-E5KFZ2vk6A1Wc31Yuj2GzBk/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Bava Kamma 92b - The bad tree strolls among the barren grove
item.description: Bava Kamma 92b - The bad tree strolls among the barren grove — בבא קמא צב: - מטייל ואזיל דיקלא בישא גבי קינא דשרכי — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mt9uC0dr0i2ohmDfzfhcEWpX4XBAACuUuBt42stq-Pc/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
